column5: i was number 66? do i get a prize?  good luck shaun we'll await the new shows.

Hey Shaun welcome back you were missed as you know there are a lot of people here that like your show a lot I hope that you miss the 1 million by 1 person as I don't think that some one need to be rewarded for calling out a non spam thread   even if you have been missing for a bit now but anyone who has been here long enough knows that as this family is like many others some drift away with there off line life and will come back, just one check to your profile could have told them that you were a long time member.  Bassman I don't mean any disrespect to you but it seems there are to many who right away get on the   wagon before knowing what is going on I also find it funny that you did not remember Shaun from years gone by as you have also been here for a long time I am not taking a shot at you at all just hope others will look at it as a positive and give long time members a chance for there posts just send a message to the MODS.  I think it is great that your show will be back as it was another good show to watch right now there are not that many good shows out there I don't want to mention others that are great shows as this is not about there shows they know how we feel any way but just wanted to be another to give you props for a great show that had a good following.  I will also join the facebook page and look forward to the new shows.
1 Million? That's only 2740 per day  , Bassman, the boat's as good as yours!

I have been an OFNer for a while and I do remember Shaun previous contributions and I am a fan of the show. Now Shaun, can you give me details on the boat, including value. I need to crunch some numbers before I set out on my campaign. As an fyi, I work in Information Technology, are you scared yet Wanna grab a coffee sometime?
sink it at 999,999 - then throw bassman the keys. its all yours!
We dont do facebook here..Horrible site in our opinions anyway, good luck to you and please keep us posted on when the show airs!

I already did mercman, it just hasn't aired yet. I shot a Musky episode with Marc Thorpe on the St. Lawrence just outside Montreal, and I boated my first 50 inch Musky! Pictrure of the beauty below    Cheers, Shaun
Nice fish Shaun! But, if I recall correctly, smiles are frowned upon by Mr. Thorpe! HH

bassman, sorry for the delayed response, my camera was in for repair and I wanted to post a picture. I took a couple of nice shots but I think this one really showcases the many features and clean lines that this boat has to offer. As for value I'll leave that up to you to determine...                                             Cheers, Shaun
Is that modified milk crate included in the deal?
Yep, that's the forward casting deck mate
You sir, are one funny bugger! lol  You've earned my "like".  I don't recall ever seeing the show but look forward to seeing it soon.  Good luck!
Funny guy!  Good luck with the show.

Thanks Shaun! I guess I should have been able to figure that out! I am familiar with TBA, but never heard the term TBC before.  I'll keep an eye out for it. Maybe keep us posted as to when and where it will air?
Shaun that to funny I think I remember that episode when you were on Erie rigging for salmon in that one you had the hot blond with you or was that the twins???
Okay you just earned a facebook like.

Shaun, the pic doesn't match the description on your facebook page:  The Urban Outdoor Adventures boat is for sale - 2007 Princecraft 198 Super Pro with a 200HP Mercury Optimax and 9.9HP four-stroke kicker (Both with throttle package and electric trim), Smart Craft computerised gauges, hydraulic steering, fully rigged, 2 colour Eagle GPS/Graphs, 109lb thrust 36 volt trolling motor with ...onboard charger, Walker dowriggers with camera and temp, rod holders, VHF radio, CD/AM-FM radio, bunk custom trailer w/brakes, all batteries and more. Boat was $70K new fully rigged, make me an offer.  Just having some fun dude.... I really, really, really, wish you success in season three. You've got some cool clips on your page. Can't wait to see the full shows.  Let me know if you ever need a volunteer for any of your events or whatever....and BTW I've got a boat and it's spectacular.  Cheers mate!
Thanks Bassman, I really appreciate it, and I may just take you up on your offer to help out... stay tuned!  Cheers, Shaun

I was hoping that I might ask a small favour from some of you OFNers. Shaun Rickard's Urban Outdoor Adventures Facebook Group is moving to a new home on Facebook. We have now created the official Shaun Rickard's Urban Outdoor Adventures Facebook Fan Page. This location is much better suited for a TV series. Our new home is more user friendly and you don't need to be a member to check out updates and videos etc. If you feel so inclined, please follow the link and 'Like' us.  http://www.facebook.com/pages/Shaun-Rickards-Urban-Outdoor-Adventures/131331680246462  As we progress with production plans for season-3 of the show we will be regularly updating our new Fan Page with videos, photographs , industry news and updates, show updates, bloopers, celebrity interviews, fishing reports and stories from our adventures.  Help us kick start our new home with a bang (o:  Thanks for your support!  Cheers, Shaun  PS. We will awward our 1 millionth Like with a new Princecraft Boat lol!
Methinks this may be  My apologies if you've already bought some ads.

Bassman, I'm asking members, if they so choose, to Like a Facebook page, I'm not tryong to sell you anything. If you feel the post is inappropriate then ask the admins to take it down. It's not spam, I'm simply sharing and looking for some support from those who wish to give it, if you don't then that's your choice.  Thanks.
I'm with you Shaun.
It's still SPAM. Correct me if I'm wrong admins.
Let it be, Bassman. Shaun has been with us since the beginning. He's contributed to our community and, as such, deserves respect from others here.

By that logic, does Mercer get a refund?  This would be easier to digest if there was a contest associated to the free ad, unless of course you really want to give away your Princecraft  BTW, I do enjoy your show Shaun.
That's funny.

How about this Bassman, if I hit 1 million likes I'll give you my Princecraft... no lol's this time, I'm serious. Now I have set you a challenge, and I will honour it! The deadline is 12 months from the date of this this post!  Cheers, Shaun
By the way Bassman, now it's a contest
LIKE...LIKE...LIKE

LOL!! Good luck with the move Shaun!! I haven't seen your show lately? What channel /time/ are you slotted for? BASSMAN, 1 million!!!    Now you could have a second career as a marketing agent   GL!!  John

Shaun, you might just have your hands full.Lol. I know Bassman and he is determined.I think he might be fishing out of a Princecraft next year.  Lol. Great idea. Just to let everyone know. We should not be quick to judge. This is a very informative "Canadian" show that we should support in mass. No different than Izumi, Kalaonka, Charlie, etc. We need to show full support on these shows. Look what we have all done for OFC community. I have pasted this to all my friends on Facebook to join. I for one love this show and its content.
Good for you! Thanks for that...being negative is just not a good scene.
Bassman.... all I gotta say is
What's the boat worth Shaun?
I will click like if you promise to not give him a boat!
Haters!
Urban Outdoor Adventures was a great show, and I learned so much about fishing in the GTA by watching that show.  I can't wait for the new season.  Best of luck Shaun.
hey shaun, don't think i've ever seen your show,but if you'll do a show on fishing in the st lawerence near Montreal, i'll join facebook and "like" you too

Good luck with the new show Shaun. For the life of me, i cant see where this show is aired or when? I did enjoy the show a few years back, but have not seen any episodes in a long time. What does TBC mean from your website? Thanks
Awesome for you Bassman - sure hope you get that boat!
Thanks smalliefisher, much appreciated

Rattletrap2, TBC means to be confirmed. We have a pretty good idea where it's going to air but haven't signed anything yet, hence the TBC. We have a lot of work ahead of us to make this happen so your support is much appreciated.  You can keep an eye out for updates etc. on the official show website too: http://www.shaunrickard.com  Cheers, Shaun
